column4: i'm trying to play an HD WMV but I'm not getting any sound...
tried it with totem and vlc
Cannot find codec for audio format 0x162.
gxine has always been my video player of choice.. 10 bucks says it works with gxine :D
file uses unsupported codec, Audio codec: Windows Media Audio v3 (0x16)
gXine usually installs windows codecs by default, which is why I assumed it worked..
try installing the mplayer/totem windows codecs?
yeah i might give that a try, thanks
sorry I was no help lol
